name: Skye's Dice
description:
Help little Skye finding her way back home after being abducted to a new dimension.

Objective:

- Roll the dice to the blue enlightened square.

- Match the blue numbers with the top of the dice.

Controls:

Arrows or WASD - Movement

This is a game made by a solo developer for the GMTK Jam 2022 in 50 hours.

Theme: Roll of the Dice.

Made by João Moraes
